meanings.definition: A permit from an authority to own or use something, do a particular thing, or carry on a trade.
meanings.sent1: The shopkeeper displayed his licenses proudly on the wall.
meanings.sent2: She needed licenses to operate her food truck legally.
meanings.sent3: The cat jokingly claimed to have licenses to nap all day.
meanings.sent4: His smile was his licenses to charm anyone he met.
meanings.sent5: The golden badge symbolized the licenses to enter the exclusive club.

meanings.definition: Formal permission from a governmental or other constituted authority to do something, as to carry on some business or profession.
meanings.sent1: The company applied for licenses to expand their services.
meanings.sent2: Without licenses, the event cannot proceed as planned.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel seemed to have licenses to raid the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was her licenses to achieve her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The key in his hand represented the licenses to unlock new opportunities.
